content: आतुर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [ईषदर्थे आ, अत्-उरच्] {@--1@} Hurt, injured. {@--2@} Suffering from, influenced or affected by, tormented, afflicted; रावणावरजा तत्र राघवं मदनातुरा <ls>R. 12. 32</ls>; <ls>Ku. 4. 25</ls>; so काम°, भय°, व्याधि° &c. {@--3@} Sick (in body or mind), disabled, diseased; आकाशेशास्तु विज्ञेया बालवृद्धकृशातुराः <ls>Ms. 4. 184</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">6. 77</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 155.</ls> {@--4@} Eager, over-anxious; <ls>M. 2.</ls> {@--5@} Weak, feeble, incapable of doing anything. --रः {@--1@} A patient, one suffering from a disease; <ls>V. 3</ls>; <ls>Pt. 5. 41.</ls> {@--2@} Illness, disease.
